text:
I played this game for the first time a couple years ago. I absolutely, positively could not stand the horrific translation and aggravating voice spam during battles. I couldn't even get past the first disc. I hear it gets better in the later discs, but, in my mind, it couldn't possibly be worth it.

Awesome song, though!

author: klagge

text:
I was thinking of it yesterday and this showed up on my recommendations today. 

 By today standards the game would probably get criticized for being too linear. And even back then, the graphics weren't considered the best. 

 But the battles were fun wtih the timing based system that hadn't been used that much. Only bad thing was the button mashy magic that I stopped using after the transformations.

 Music was some of the best.

text:
I really love legend of dragoons
this is one awesome game, one of the best rpg's ever and the story of this game is easily one of the best storylines, yes yes I know its the classic fight between good and evil, there is a chosen one and the evil one and they fight and bla bla, but how the story progress is very well done and it really gets you hooked.

I love this one <3
